choices.C: Disable HSRP IP redirects on SW-1.
choices.B: Set the HSRP priority to 70 on SW-1.
choices.A: Set the HSRP password on SW-2.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A recent configuration change removes the HSRP adjacency between the SW-1 and SW-2 Cisco Nexus switches. The change causes the servers on this subnet to lose Internet access. Which action restores the connectivity of all servers on VLAN 13?
An engineer troubleshoots a packet flow from an access leaf to a spine. Which EVPN routes are expected on this connection?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
EVPN Route Types
The EVPN control plane advertises the following types of information:

Route type 1 – This is an Ethernet Auto-Discovery (EAD) route type used to advertise Ethernet segment identifier, Ethernet Tag ID, and EVPN instance information. EAD route advertisements may be sent for each EVPN instance or for each Ethernet segment.

Route type 2 – This advertises endpoint reachability information, including MAC and IP addresses of the endpoints or VTEPs.

Route type 3 – This performs multicast router advertisement, announcing the capability and intention to use ingress replication for specific VNIs.

Route type 4 – This is an Ethernet Segment route used to advertise the Ethernet segment identifier, IP address length, and the originating router's IP address.

Route type 5 – This is an IP prefix route used to advertise internal IP subnet and externally learned routes to a VXLAN network.

Selected Answer: D
It's neccesary change the template, not the service profile

choices.B: Change vHBA0 to VSAN 11 in Service Profile.
choices.A: Change Adapter Policy to VMWare on vHBA0.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A blade that is connected to FI-A fails to boot from a SAN LUN. The boot policy is configured to boot by using vHBA0 as the SAN Primary. Which set of actions resolves the issue?

//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. The OTV overlay is deployed in multicast mode. After an unexpected reload of N7K-SITE1-OTV1, the network administrator observed that on N7K-SITE1-OTV2 the OTV site adjacency went into the partial state. Which action resolves the issue?

choices.C: Configure the Site-Identifier on N7K-SITE1-OTV1 to 0002.0002.0002.
choices.A: Change the Site-VLAN on N7K-SITE1-OTV2 to VLAN 1.
choices.B: Enable IP IGMP version 3 on the join interface on N7K-SITE1-OTV1.
choices.D: Modify the multicast data-group on N7K-SITE1-OTV1 to match N7K-SITE1-OTV2.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Should be C

choices.D: Rediscover the Nexus switch from the DCNM server.
choices.C: Globally enable Cisco Discovery Protocol on the switch and on the DCNM interface.
choices.A: Restart the Advanced Message Queuing Protocol service in the DCNM appliance.
choices.B: Increase the heap size of the Elasticsearch on the DCNM server.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A network engineer must add a Cisco Nexus 5000 Series Switch to a Cisco DCNM. However, the device discovery status shows as unreachable. The engineer verifies these parameters:

• compatibility matrix between the DCNM server and the Nexus switch
• credentials to the Nexus switch
• IP connectivity and reachability between DCNM and the Nexus switch
• enablement of SSH on the Nexus switch

Which procedure resolves the issue?
